Question.Subject: I cant send mail from my alternative address to any Yahoo address?
Question.Content: I recently registered a new Yahoo mail address (r.crusoe14@yahoo.com) and am unable to sent any mail fromm my alternative address (crusoe@telkomsa.net) I get a mail demon answer that it is blocked,
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Need more info are you sending from telkomsa.net to yahoo mail?
Oh and you shoild never put you email address out there in the form that you did. This r.crusoe14@yahoo.com should be rdotcrusoe14atyahoodotcom it will help keep the spammers at bay.

Answer.Content:
Need more info are you sending from telkomsa.net to yahoo mail?
Oh and you shoild never put you email address out there in the form that you did. This r.crusoe14@yahoo.com should be rdotcrusoe14atyahoodotcom it will help keep the spammers at bay.
